content: He’ll usually start the fight with a big leaping strike, falling to the ground with one slash, and then quickly following up with a second slash from his other claw. Unfortunately, he’s a pretty evasive foe, and finding the right moments to counter attack can be tricky.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lingxuzi.md', within the main section titled 'Lingxuzi', specifically from the subsection 'Lingxuzi Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He’ll usually start the fight with a big leaping strike, falling to the ground with one slash, and then quickly following up with a second slash from his other claw. Unfortunately, he’s a pretty evasive foe, and finding the right moments to counter attack can be tricky.
